fxInfo_clarification: These are ordinalized versions of the V-Dem civil liberties index. The original index ranges from 0 to 1. These transformations offer three different ordinal versions with three _3C, four _4C, and five _5C levels respectively.
fxInfo_question: To what extent is civil liberty respected?
name: e_v2x_civlib_3C /_4C /_5C
